code: import{usersSliceActions}from"..";import{normolizeEntities}from"../../helpers/normalizeEntites";export var loadUsers=function loadUsers(_ref){var userId=_ref.userId;return function(dispatch){var options={method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json;charset=utf-8"},body:JSON.stringify({id:userId})};dispatch(usersSliceActions.startLoading());var url=new URL("https://wsuno.xyz/api/getUsers");fetch(url,options).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){if(data.OK){dispatch(usersSliceActions.successLoading(normolizeEntities(data.result)));}else throw Error(data.error);}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);dispatch(usersSliceActions.failLoading(err));});};};
